about_the_game:
Robberies, mugging, stealing, picking pockets and wreaking havoc in a beautiful medieval world - it all waits for you in Bandit Brawler. Follow orders from a magical rooster, pick fights with everyone around and blow up a couple of patrols. You know? Like back in the ol'days.


A kick in the nuts, a sucker punch, a bitchslap - it's your arsenal do deal with everyday bandit problems. In Bandit Brawler the open world responds to most of your actions, so make sure you mean business. Take advantage od explosives, bows and magical clubs to come out victorious over your opponents. Create combos and send your enemies flying into the air. Literally.


What's a better way of spending your hard earned loot than to bet it and bet strong! Explore the world and find shady characters willing to bet their gold aginst yours. Play several minigames such as Dice, Drink up and Slap Game to earn respect in the 'hood and multiply your earnings. Remember: the more the risk, the bigger the reward.
Unless you lose it all, that is.


If you are more of a sneaky rascal, Bandit Brawler allows you to creep around, break into peoples houses, pick their pockets and lockpick their chests with suprising loot inside. Sometimes a chest is filled with gold and jewels. Sometimes with cheese. Oh, but what a cheese it is indeed.


Your main quest will revolve around helping a magical chicken get back to normal. Whatever by 'normal' he means. To aid him you will explore an open madieval world, fight with goons and knights alike, earn gold and respect to ultimately unlock several skills and bandit tools to help you on your quest. Remember: chicken don't fly, and pigs don't walk on two legs.
Until they do.


Besides tavern brawls and looting houses, you will get your faithful horse, new gear, custom fighting gloves, new techniques of dispatching enemies and various ways of becoming the ultimate bandit in the neighbourhood.

Jump in and explore a colorful world filled with chests to loot and damsels to capture!
